posts.title: S/Y ARESTEAS â€“ NOW AVAILABLE from 25 August onwards
posts.description: The splendour of ARESTEAS is magnificent to behold as it pairs the romance of life under sail with generous volume and luxury lifestyle amenities.
posts.content:
ARESTEAS is a 50.75 metre superyacht built in 2007 and refitted in 2020. She is an accredited RYA water sports centre and a perfect option for an action-packed charter. On deck there is ample space for 12 guests to socialise, dine alfresco, and indulge in a relaxing jacuzzi with uninterrupted views to the horizon.

 

ARESTEAS boasts an exceptional interior design featuring a blend of natural materials, including leather, wood, and marble. The overall finish is warm, comfortable, and inviting.

 

The saloon, bar, and dining area as direct access to the aft deck’s outside lounge, while a central staircase connects the upper deck and flybridge.

 

Accommodation comprises six en-suite cabins made up of four doubles and two twins. The full-beam master suite is positioned forward on the main deck and has its own walk-in closet, a his-and-hers marble bathroom, and three statement skylights.

 

The guest rooms on the lower deck includes two VIP suites with their own lounge space.

 

The hydraulic swim platform aft facilities offer ease-of-access to and from the water. You will not be disappointed by the choice of water sports on board, including jet skis, seabob, scuba diving equipment, fishing tackle, various towing inflatables, a sea-safe pool, on-water trampoline, and a water slide!

 

With all the incredible activities available on board, don’t forget to make some time for on-shore excursions to visit the local towns, historical sites, or bustling markets.

 

When you return to the boat, you can enjoy the cinema room, fully-equipped gym, sauna, Himalayan salt wall, and finally a relaxing massage in the massage room.

 

ARESTEAS sails on West and East Mediterranean Sea during the Summer season, and is ideal for a family and friends cruising adventure.
 

Please contact us for the full brochure.
 

Don’t lose out! Book your yacht charter now while she is still available from the 25th of August onwards.
 

Simply email us and chat to one of our expert charter consultants to book the ARESTEAS. We have a choice of other wonderful gulets and yachts to select from as well, and we will gladly assist you in finding the perfect match for your needs and budget.
 

From,

Your eXclusive Gulets team
posts.meta_description: The splendour of ARESTEAS is magnificent to behold as it pairs the romance of life under sail with generous volume and luxury lifestyle amenities.

posts.title: Make memorable moments with your family on an adventure-packed yachting holiday in Turkey
posts.description: The Turkish Riviera is an acclaimed beach vacation destination in the Mediterranean, and the ideal setting for your next family adventure! While some may feel that a yachting holiday for the family may not satisfy the thrill of adventure for some, they may need to think again.
posts.content:
An idyllic getaway

From water sports to hiking, Turkey’s turquoise coastline has something for everyone. The southwest coast of Turkey on the Aegean Sea is home to some of the most pristine and beautiful bays and coves. This idyllic vacation spot is where the Blue Voyage was first made famous. Here, the crosswinds are excellent for sailing. As pine, oak and myrtle-filled mountains plunge down to serene beaches, the coastline offers a choice of places to anchor.

Water sports to spend your energy

The Gulf of Hisaronu is hidden away in the most western corner of Turkey. The conditions of this peaceful location are perfect for water sports, including jet ski sessions, windsurfing, and snorkeling. You can also arrange to have your own private lessons in the vicinity of your own private yacht. So, who says yachting is only for soaking up the sun and taking in the local surrounds? Selected yachts are equipped with their own water sports equipment, allowing family members to spend their energy on the breathtaking waters as you cruise around to some of the nearby coves along the shore.

Hidden treasures

Traditional gulet cruises in the area are a testament to time-honored Turkish craftsmanship. Due to the rugged mountainous landscape, they are also the best way to explore the hard-to-reach beaches and coves along the shoreline. Beach lovers flock to this part of the world for its intrinsic beauty. Straddled between the two continents of Asia and Europe, Turkey is rated by Conde Nast Traveller as one of the Best Countries in the World 2020 as voted in the Readers' Choice Awards. The city of Bodrum in the peninsula of the same name is a glamorous hangout in the Mediterranean with crystal clear waters praised by divers and swimmers. Travelers have also claimed that the clarity of the water is such that boats seem to be suspended in the air. The warm weather is typical of the Mediterranean climate, warm, yet tempered by cooling winds, creating the perfect playground for water sports such as windsurfing and kite surfing which are popular in the area. Private yachts often anchor in unspoiled coves opening up onto the sea. Clear waters and idyllic beaches provide great opportunities for swimming, diving and fishing. 

A hiker's paradise

The Gokova Gulf is a sought-after destination for nature lovers. As the Taurus Mountains run parallel to the coastline, falling perpendicular into the Aegean Sea, the dramatic terrain, and awe-inspiring views across the Mediterranean, not forgetting the unique historical and archeological sites, is the ultimate hiking paradise.

Did you know that there are over 300 hikes in Turkey that you can choose from? If you have time on your hands, the country’s original and most popular hiking trail, The Lycian Way, spans 540km and takes about a month to walk. Needless to say, there is a plethora of hiking trails to pick from. Depending on your cruise itinerary, a guide can help to identify the hidden gems along the seaboard. 

Sail away with us

 

The Turkish Riviera enjoys one of the longest sailing seasons from April to mid-October. June to August are the hottest months. Book your charter yacht today to this trailblazing family adventure destination along the Turkish Riviera. Our crew is on standby to take your call.

 

 

Brochure Request
A yachting holiday for active families, packed with adventure!
posts.meta_description: While some may feel that a yachting holiday for the family may not satisfy the thrill of adventure for some, they may need to think again.

posts.title: Silver Moon
posts.description: Sailing the Aegean Sea in a custom-built work of art
posts.content:
The Silver Moon is more than just a leisure craft. Described as a 'work of art', this superior 36 metre yacht is custom-made in the maritime tradition of ship building.

 

Built in 2010, Silver Moon was completely refitted in 2020 to further enhance its beauty, comfort, and sailing performance.

 

The classic lines of the yacht's premium interiors encompass four well-appointed cabins comprising a Master Cabin, VIP Cabin, Double Cabin, and Triple Cabin. A total of nine guests can be comfortably accommodated.

 

The Silver Moon also has a spacious saloon for dining and socialising. When guests are not out enjoying the sun, water sports, and land excursions, they can relax and put their feet up to enjoy some TV, the music system, and WI-FI onboard.

 

Discover the dreamlike Turquoise Coast of Turkey

 

Sailing the dreamlike Turquoise Coast of Turkey opens up a treasure trove of natural wonders.  Many of the countless coves to be discovered on this extensive coastline are only reachable by boat. Safely and expertly navigated by the captain, guests will be enamoured by the splendours of these blue waters on which the experienced five-member crew of the Silver Moon are highly skilled.

 

The Turkish coastline is more than 8,000 kilometres long and is bordered by four different seas, namely the Mediterranean Sea, the Black Sea, the Aegean Sea, and the Marmara Sea. 

 

Bodrum, on the Mugla Province, is one of the unmissable gems of the popular Turquoise Coast, also well-known as the Turkish Riviera. Bodrum is the birthplace of Turkey's blue voyage. Similarly, Gocek is one of the favourite places for blue voyage boats.

 

The small waterfront town on the Turkish Mediterranean coast, Gocek, is in fact a trending holiday spot for 2021.

 

With the Silver Moon, you and your guests can take in the panoramic views at your leisure, stopping to take in the picturesque towns and charming villages, each with so much to offer. From hiking and plenty other adventure activities to discovering the must-see sights of antiquity, shopping to your heart's delight, drinking Turkish tea, or dining out on mouth-watering local cuisine.

 

The Mediterranean Sailing Season 

 

The rhythm of life at sea slows down to a relaxing pace as you step back onboard the Silver Moon to set off and explore some more of the exotic and vibrant beauty that attracts travellers from around the world.

 

Did you know that Turkey enjoys one of the longest sailing seasons on the Mediterranean? The weather is exceptional from April to mid-October with water temperatures ranging from 18 to 26 degrees Celsius.

 

The Silver Moon offers a host of water sports, including water skiing, a ringo, two paddle boards, two canoes, a wakeboard, snorkelling equipment, and even some fishing gear. Sun bathers can also of course just enjoy some time-out on the sun mattresses laid out on the front deck.

 

A specially prepared menu by the Silver Moon's exemplary chef will serve up a choice of decadent meals from breakfast to dinner. Guests are welcome to dine in the saloon or savour their surrounds by dining alfresco on the aft deck.

 

To find out what more the Turquoise Coast has to offer, go to https://www.exclusivegulets.com/destinations/turquoise-coast-turkey.

 

Your experienced team of charter consultants at Exclusive Gulets will ensure you receive the very best sailing vacation that meets your holiday wish list. Email us today at info@exclusivegulets.com.

posts.title: The ideal summer vacation getaway is available NOW!
posts.description: The Caribbean is calling and there is a luxury charter yacht with your name on it.
posts.content:
With Covid-19 vaccinations in full swing in the United States, the UK, and other countries across the world, we're excited that international travel is taking off again.

 

The Caribbean, of course, is one of the most sought-after destinations on travellers' lists for the summer. It is also the perfect yacht charter destination with endless possibilities.

 

In a class of its own

 

If you're in search of sugar-white, sun-kissed beaches, a warm, balmy climate, hospitable people, and beautiful scenery, the Caribbean has it all!

This acclaimed beach vacation destination is embroidered with dozens of picturesque islands, each unique in character and appeal.

 

Of course, chartering a yacht for a vacation is pure bliss on water. If the word 'boring' pops up in your mind, think again. The Caribbean is brimming with aquatic life and boasts some of the world's best dives.

 

Tailored to your every desire

 

Clear blue skies and inviting azure waters are an invitation like no other to spend all your pent-up energy from staying indoors on lockdown on a choice of water sports, from jet skis and stand-up paddling to snorkelling and windsurfing. Your own private lessons in the vicinity of your yacht can also be arranged.

 

Exclusive Gulets will arrange the best itineraries to suit you! On board celebrations, exciting excursions, bookings at the finest restaurant in town, sundown cocktails, spa treatments, fitness instruction, and just plain old fun in the sun for the whole family can all be part of the mix.

 

The calm sailing seas of the Caribbean make it a great location to explore by sea. There is plenty to explore and different shorelines to discover.

 

Private travel has never been this appealing

 

Sailing this tropical region, which is a fantastic all-year-round destination, you can still keep your social distance by staying with your ow

n private group of family and friends as you roam the islands.

 

In addition, you will also have your own professional crew to take care of your every need, and a world-class chef to whip up mouth-watering cuisine for breakfast, lunch, and dinner… and a few scrumptious snacks in-between. An experienced captain will ensure your overall on board experience will meet all your expectations within the safety requirements of the yacht charter.

 

Exceptional yachting is only a click away

 

Exclusive Gulets are luxury gulet and yacht charter experts that deliver exceptional cruising experiences on some of the world's finest motor sailers.

Browse through our phenomenal selection of yachts in the Caribbean.

 

Get in touch with the team today for your very own tailor-made experience on water!
posts.meta_description: The Caribbean is calling and there is a luxury charter yacht with your name on it. With Covid-19 vaccinations in full swing in the United States, the UK, and other countries across the world, we're excited that international travel is taking off again.

posts.title: Top 3 benefits why you should choose our Yoga cruise for your next vacation
posts.description: To be calm is the highest achievement of self. - Zen proverb
posts.content:
The stresses and strains that have been placed on people the world over due to the worries created by the Covid-19 pandemic are not to be brushed off. The toll that the virus has placed on our mental health is great, and it is important that we, each in our own way, find ways to clear negative thought processes and seek uplifting activities to raise our energy levels.

 

Wouldn't it be great to go on a wellness retreat that harnesses the healing powers of the body and ocean?

 

We invite you to find your calm on the ocean with our Yoga cruises. Here are just 3 of the benefits why choosing a Yoga cruise for your next vacation can help you find the tranquillity your body is yearning for.

 

1) Finding balance

 

 

Yoga for one is an age-old form of exercise that can boost your physical and mental wellbeing. The series of movements not only help create strength and flexibility in the body but also help you find balance and refocus your mind.

 

According to John Hopkins Medicine, yoga poses several health benefits, including reducing body-wide inflammation and improving heart health.

 

It is the ideal healing activity to help you relax your mind as you breathe in the calm and exhale all the stress and anxiety.

 

2) Emotional wellbeing

 

 

The ocean is another great source of comfort. A best-selling book, Blue Mind, by marine biologist Dr. Wallace J Nichols, reveals why being near, in, on, or underwater can make you happier, healthier, and more connected.

 

Humans have throughout their existence been drawn to water, and for good reason. The brain is fortified by the sound and sight of the ocean. Blue Mind is a term used to describe water-related peace, a mildly meditative space identified by calm, peace, and a general sense of happiness.

 

Ocean air has health benefits too. Did you know that sea air accelerates your ability to absorb oxygen? The detoxifying effects of breathing in salt-rich air will leave you feeling invigorated while in the same breath balancing your serotonin levels - a body chemical linked with mood and stress.

 

3) Ocean therapy

 

 

Water is considered the elixir and source of life. Not only does water make up 70% of the earth's surface, but it also makes up 70% of our bodies. Our ties to water, therefore, have a deep biological connection that triggers an immediate response in our brain when we're near water.

 

Just staring at the ocean alone changes the frequency of our brain waves. Not to mention the negative ions in the sea breeze that too has a mood-boosting effect. 

 

So it's easy to expect the positive impact ocean therapy can have on the emotional center of the brain, inducing feelings of calm and rejuvenation.

 

Studies show that immersing oneself in water produces a natural dopamine high in the body. (Dopamine is the feel-good hormone released in the brain when intense feelings of pleasure are felt by the body.)  This is why Ocean Therapy or Surf Therapy helps people cope with mental, emotional, and physical illness by accessing the ocean environment.

 

The best of all worlds

 

One three-month study found that performing one hour of yoga 6 days a week notably increased dopamine levels.

 

Now, imagine the satisfaction you will feel combining the thrill of the ocean with calming yoga on a private yacht charter?

 

Combining yoga with a cruise is a travel experience of a lifetime. With a personalized yacht charter, this dream can be your reality this holiday season.

 

The breath-taking seascapes of Turkey, France, Greece, Croatia, and Italy are yours for the taking. Each destination is famous for its food scenes, secluded islands (that can only be reached by gulet or yacht), and firmly rooted traditions. This is a bucket list adventure you don't want to turn down.

 

Sail away with us

 

For the full therapeutic experience, Exclusive Gulets has a choice of gulets and yachts to choose from with amenities to accommodate everyone.

 

There will be no shortage of ocean therapy between your yoga sessions and refreshing water sports - including swimming, snorkeling, kayaks, wakeboards, and stand-up paddle boards, as you reignite your passion for life.

 

Our selection of cruise vessels offers beautiful, modern interior and exterior designs with ample deck space to stretch out and soak up the sunrise or the golden hour just before sunset. As you do so overlook the splendor of the azure water and the flawless nature that surrounds you at your anchored destination.

 

You could also fit in a little meditation on a shaded beach

 

Why not tailor your menu as well to absorb the goodness of fresh local produce, succulent fish, and free-range chicken and meat seasoned and prepared to capture all the mouth-watering flavors.

 

Group and solo traveler options

 

Get a group of friends together and bring along your yoga instructor for a spectacular yoga cruise. Or, if you prefer, Exclusive Gulets can also arrange a yoga instructor for your private yacht charter.

 

Traveling solo? You too can experience the gentle lure of the ocean. Enquire with the Exclusive Gulets team about their cabin-only options on specially arranged yoga yacht cruises.

 

Chat to us today and in no time we will have you zen'd out on the most relaxing yacht cruise designed to re-ignite your senses.
posts.meta_description: Wouldn't it be great to go on a wellness retreat that harnesses the healing powers of the body and ocean? Yoga cruise vacation can help you find the tranquillity your body is yearning for.
